short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quick and easy text search for Chrome tabs

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Use simple text search to quickly and easily find relevant Chrome tabs.

Use the shortcut key to instantly access the extension (this can be configured in your extension settings):
- Default: Ctrl + Shift + X
- Mac: Cmd + Shift + X
